snippet: While the rule making will speed up, the core problems with the financial system and its regulators are deeper than personnel and sadly impervious to which party occupies the White House.
abstract: While the rule making will speed up, the core problems with the financial system and its regulators are deeper than personnel and sadly impervious to which party occupies the White House.

headline.main: For Obama, No Easy Fix for Convoluted Regulatory System
headline.print_headline: For Obama, No Easy Fix for Convoluted Regulatory System

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
